name: Nuderit Natashas
detailed_description:
Nuderit Natashas is simple adult puzzle game where you need to make a complete picture of a naked girl from small fragments. Make pictures and pump your mind!

- one-handed play
- 20 levels
- all sorts of options on each of them
- pleasant music
- addictive gameplay
- UHD (4K) resolution support (3840x2160 pixels)

As soon as possible:
- themed trading cards
- themed backgrounds
- themed emoticons

short_description: Nuderit Natashas is simple adult puzzle game where you need to make a complete picture of the naked girls from small fragments. Make pictures and pump your mind!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
